features.title: Everything you need to hire with confidence

feature1.title: Centralized Hiring Hub
feature1.text: Manage all your hiring activities in one place. From posting jobs to scheduling interviews, Zamdit simplifies your hiring workflow, allowing your team to collaborate easily, track candidate progress, and share notes, all within one dashboard.

feature2.title: Fast and Automated Hiring Processes
feature2.text: Move candidates through the hiring process faster than ever. Automated assessments, reminders, and streamlined approvals save valuable time, so your team can focus on making the right hiring decisions.

feature3.title: Thorough Candidate Evaluations
feature3.text: Make hiring decisions with confidence using tools for in-depth candidate evaluations. Use Zamdit's customizable scorecards, detailed comparison tools, and automated evaluation summaries to deeply analyze candidate suitability.

feature4.title: No-Code Career Portal Builder
feature4.text: Attract quality talent with a branded, no-code career portal. Easily create and update your portal to showcase open positions, company culture, and growth opportunities to stand out in a competitive hiring landscape.

video.title: See how Zamdit works in 60 seconds!

card1.title: A Game-Changer for Our Hiring Process
card1.text: We reduced our time-to-hire by 50% after switching to Zamdit. The platform's intuitive interface and automation features have made our recruitment process more efficient than ever. I can’t imagine going back to our old methods.
card1.name: Sophie Richards

card2.title: Efficient and Reliable
card2.text: Using Zamdit has streamlined every step of our hiring process. From automated reminders to detailed candidate evaluation tools, everything works seamlessly. It’s refreshing to see a tool that truly understands what recruiters need.
card2.name: Lisa Thompson

card3.title: Simplifies Team Collaboration
card3.text: Zamdit has made it so much easier for our hiring team to work together. The ability to share notes, scorecards, and candidate updates in real-time has eliminated confusion and saved us a lot of back-and-forth emails. It’s truly a collaborative tool that keeps everyone on the same page.
card3.name: Michael Rivera

card4.title: Customizable and User-Friendly
card4.text: I love how flexible Zamdit is! The no-code career portal builder allowed us to create a branded, professional portal in no time. It’s so user-friendly that even my less tech-savvy colleagues find it easy to navigate and use.
card4.name: Daniel Nguyen

security.title: Your data is safe with us
security.introduction: At Zamdit, we prioritize the security and privacy of your data. Our platform is built on reliable, world-class cloud infrastructure, ensuring your information is always protected and accessible when you need it.
security.point1Text: Zamdit uses industry-standard encryption and secure connections to keep your data safe from unauthorized access.
security.point2Text: We adhere to stringent data protection regulations to safeguard candidate and organizational information.
security.point3Text: Our team conducts continuous monitoring and security audits to maintain the highest standards of safety and reliability.
security.conclusion: With Zamdit, you can focus on hiring the best talent while we take care of protecting your data.

demo.title: Request a Personalized Demo of Zamdit
demo.subtitle: Experience how Zamdit can streamline your hiring process. Request a live demo, and our team will walk you through the key features, answer your questions, and show you how Zamdit can help you hire smarter and faster.
demo.point1: Personalized Consultation – We'll start with a quick discussion to understand your hiring needs and how Zamdit can support your company.
demo.point2: Live Product Walkthrough – Get a hands-on look at Zamdit's features and see how they simplify and speed up hiring.
demo.point3: Use Case Insights – Discover how companies like yours benefit from Zamdit and how it can fit into your workflow.
demo.point4: Tailored Recommendations – Explore the best plan for your business based on your goals and requirements.
demo.point5: No Obligation – This is a free, no-commitment demo to help you make an informed decision.
